title: Did Charles Crowther write a book entitled: "The enemy among us? "
subtitle: The columnist of the Washington Post did not write an article alleging that former President Barack Obama was creating "a shadow government" by organizing non-profit work.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The columnist Charles Crowther wrote an op-ed article entitled "The enemy among us," claiming that former President Barack Obama was creating "the shadow government" through his non-profit organization of work.
